paragraph1: Self-taught web developer, I would like the opportunity to turn my passion for coding into a career. Curious and resourceful, I learn quickly and adapt easily to new tools and concepts.
paragraph2: Over the past year, I have immersed myself in web development, both front-end and back-end, through hands-on projects that have helped me strengthen my technical skills. Designing tailor-made solutions to meet user needs has become a true source of motivation for me.
paragraph3: Always eager to learn and take on new challenges, I am looking to get involved in innovative projects where I can leverage my creativity and skills.
